verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of praise. <WH8426> Make a joyful noise to the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> you lands. <WH776>
Serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> with gladness: <WH8057> come <WH935> before his presence <WH6440> with singing. <WH7445>

Know <WH3045> you that the LORD <WH3068> he is God: <WH430> it is he that has made <WH6213> us, and not we ourselves; <WH587> we are his people, <WH5971> and the sheep <WH6629> of his pasture. <WH4830>
Enter <WH935> into his gates <WH8179> with thanksgiving, <WH8426> and into his courts <WH2691> with praise: <WH8416> be thankful <WH3034> to him, and bless <WH1288> his name. <WH8034>
For the LORD <WH3068> is good; <WH2896> his mercy <WH2617> is everlasting; <WH5769> and his truth <WH530> endures to all generations. <WH1755>
